name: Ascending the Steppe
description:
"Ascending the Steppe" is an epic interactive game that immerses you in the world of the Steppe, where you will take on the role of a young warrior determined to rise above all odds and unify all sects of the grassland into one powerful nation.

Your journey will not be an easy one, as you will face powerful enemies, treacherous allies, and difficult challenges along the way. But with your wits, your skills, and your determination, you will overcome these obstacles and emerge victorious.

As you progress through the game, you will have to make important decisions that will shape your sect and your legacy. You will need to build alliances, make enemies, and navigate the politics of the Steppe. You will have to lead your people into battle, defending your sect or expanding your territory.

The game also involves a combat system that combines horseback riding, archery, and melee combat. You will be able to train and upgrade your warrior, learn new skills and techniques, and customize your equipment.

As the moment, the game only has Chapter I and Chapter II. Your support on Patreon will have me continue to its completion.
